fields.description:
Had no idea how to find the ward I was supposed to be attending and there was only one very confusing sign!

Please add better signage so that people don't waste time looking for their wardsww
fields.title: Couldn't find my ward

fields.description: They didn’t seem to know who anyone was - I was constantly told I was a different patient and consequently had to check the medication given to me before taking it. I found this quite worrying for an antenatal ward, full of pregnant women.
fields.title: Know who your patients are

fields.description: The hospital was pretty dirty and clinical waste had built up.  I was worried about putting my slippers on the floor because it was so manky.  I think the cleaning and waste removal staff could do a better job.
fields.title: Really dirty

fields.description: In the Gastroenterology outpatients department many patients were not able to hear their names being called and were worried that they had been missed out..  Also it was very hot in the department and I could see no water dispensers anywhere. Perhaps a couple of those could be installed somewhere obvious
fields.title: Confused, thirsty patients

fields.description: I got sent a letter from this hospital advising me of my 'due date' but I am a man.  I think they need to check their records a bit better.
fields.title: I'm a man!

fields.description: I went to see a doctor who prodded my sore wrist and then said that he thought I might have ganglions, he then started typing on his computer and said that everything was set up for me. He did not once explain what the next process would be. Again, when I asked him what exactly had been 'set up' - he abruptly said I would have to have more tests done and a letter would be sent to my GP and I would receive a copy. He then stated that I had to email him once I received a copy of the letter to ask for further information. I am totally confused as to what the next steps are in my situation.
fields.title: Really confused about what happens next

fields.description: I received a letter telling me the time and date for my procedure and in the letter it both told me to contact the hospital or my booking would be cancelled and to not contact the hospital unless I got ill.  It would be good if the letters could be clearer.
fields.title: Letters could be clearer
